Setting.Name: OneTimeAuth::CustomerErrorMessageRefreshFailed
Setting.Description: The message which will be sent to the customer if a link could not be generated.

Value.Item: Link konnte nicht erzeugt werden, bitte senden Sie eine email an support@we.com.

Setting.Name: OneTimeAuth::CustomerErrorMessageLinkExpired
Setting.Description: The message which the customer user will see if he uses an invalid token.

Value.Item: Ihr Link verweist auf kein noch gültiges Ticket.

Setting.Name: OneTimeAuth::CustomerErrorMessageWrongLink
Setting.Description: The message which the customer user will see if he uses an old token with an active one already being present.

Value.Item: Aus Sicherheitsgründen müssen Sie den neuesten Ihnen zugesandten Link nutzen um auf dieses Ticket zuzugreifen.

Setting.Name: OneTimeAuth::CustomerErrorMessageNewLink
Setting.Description: The message which the customer user will see if a new one is sent to his email address.

Value.Item: Ihre Session ist leider abgelaufen - ein neuer Link wurde an Ihre Email-Adresse gesendet.

Setting.Name: OneTimeAuth::AccessDaysAfterClose
Setting.Description: The number of days customer users can use direct links to open tickets after they are closed.

Setting.Name: OneTimeAuth::TokenRefreshNotificationID
Setting.Description: Send the text of a notification to the customer user if he refreshs his token.
